_header: In full great heaviness mine heart is pwyght
_description: A moral lament — six stanzas rhyme royal

CULFf16.First Lines:
In fful grett hevenesse myn hert ys pwyghtAnd sadely warpud mony a
                    ffowld…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…And shurtely shew they graceTho comfort the trowth and aft
                    ffalshed defaceAmen pur cherite

Beadle,  Richard,  and  Alfred E. B. Owen.  
             The Findern Manuscript: Cambridge University Library MS. F.1.6.
         London: Scolar Press, 1977.
